channel.title: Should there be Ppl that are still interesed in Ritzscape
channel.description:
ritzscape was my first rsps expierence, in 2009 back then it was epic and awsome like 300/400 players online always
but few days ago i tryed to find it but its shutted down
and i found the release source and client in server downloads
u guys think ppl will still be interesed to play it, the once great server
( it is delta )

item.title: Should there be Ppl that are still interesed in Ritzscape
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

I thought people would play 2Speced again but they would join and quit. If you think youâ€™ll be able to get a lot of players on by trying to be an old server, it will not work.
